page.title: 12A Typical Day at School.
page.content: We start school at five to nine and finish at three o' clock.We put our coats and lunchbags away,then we have assembly.Afterwards we go to our classroom and do some mental arithmetic.We have to do a page of maths before playtime.Afterwards Mrs. Rose takes us for language and reading.At 12 o'clock we wash for lunch.After lunch we go out to play till 1 o'clock and do some reading.At ten past one we change for games.We play short tennis, cricket,volley ball or rounders with Mrs. Palmer.I am learning to play the violin and am in the school orchestra. We have clubs for choir, book club,cookery,computer, rounder and recorders. On Friday we go to the local swimming pool.We do lots of projects and we are enjoying the "Domesday Project".Soon we will have the long summer holidays
